infra.LinearElementSection.description: Defines a directed linear object (with a linear extension) located on a LinearElement

startOffsetFromOrigin.description: Defines the start offset from the origin

endOffsetFromOrigin.description: Defines the end offset from the origin

appliesInBothDirections.description: Defines if the section applies in both directions

opp.TrainGroupSpec.description: Defines the train aspects, which define if the train belongs to the restricted group.

axleLoadCategories.description: Trains with the listed Axle-Load-Category belong to the TrainGroup.

cantDeficiencyCategories.description: Defines the different cant deficiency categories

opp.RestrictedAspect.description: Defines single aspects of the infrastructure restriction

temporarySpeedRestriction.description: Defines the temporary speed restriction on the track

nonStopping.description: Defines the non stopping area. if true, the trains defined in trainGroupSpec shall not stop within restriction area

trackClosure.description: Defines track closure information. If true, the trains defined in trainGroupSpec shall not enter restriction area

operationalRadioHole.description: Defines the presence of operational radio holes. if true radio communication is restricted within restriction area

atoInhibition.description: Defined the ato inhibition zones. Exmaples: train section is not contantly monitored, or stimulate driver's attention, or approaching overcrouded station

maxCurrent.description: Defines max current value. For ATO, SS126. Ignored by TrafficCS

opp.SpecificRestriction.description: Defines single aspect of the infrastructure restriction.

appliedToTrains.description: Defines the applicable trains that are affected by the specific restriction

restrictedAspects.description: Defines the restricted aspects associated to a specific restriction

opp.RestrictionArea.description: Defines a topological area, in which the restrictions must be applied.

specificRestrictions.description: Defines the list of specific restrictions

opp.OperationalEventRef.description: Defines a reference to one of possible OperationalEvents (as a unit)

movementEvent.description: refers a movement event including the movement plan

restrictionEvent.description: Refers a restriction event including restriction plan

warningMeasureEvent.description: Refers a warnning measure event including the warning plan

description: Defines a part of temporary infrastructure restriction, especially if one Restriction plan contains several areas to be activate to different times.

id.description: Defines the Identity of the object; used for referencing

creationTime.description: Defines the time when the restrictionArea shall be created=implemented=activated in interlocking, in UTC

removalTime.description: Defines the removal time in UTC

restrictionArea.description: Defines the restriction area associated to a restriction event

startsAfterEvents.description: Defines the set of operational events, which must be finished before the current event starts.
